name: 14k Gold Classic Huggies
description: These 14k solid gold huggie earrings are timeless - show them off by wearing them with your favorite solid gold studs, huggies and hoops.

name: Diamond Double Down Huggies
description: Featuring a double row of thirty-six diamonds set in solid gold, these huggie earrings are sure to make a statement in your ear stack.

name: Diamond Jolie Studs
description: The beauty of earring stacking lies in the opportunity to mix and match different styles, shapes, and sizes. Style this pair of diamond studs in first, second or third piercings.

name: Pearl Newport Chain Huggies
description: Crafted with a genuine freshwater pearl set on a 14k solid gold chain, this pair of modern huggie earrings are perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

name: Diamond Ace Studs
description: The Diamond Ace Studs are the perfect style for any tennis lover. These 14k solid gold and diamond tennis ball earrings are a meaningful addition to any stack.

name: 14k Gold Parker Huggies
description: A pair of classic, link chain inspired huggie earrings designed to be worn in first, second or third piercings.

name: 14k White Gold Classic Huggies
description: Crafted from 14k white gold, this pair of classic huggies are perfect for everyday wear. Stack them with your favorite studs or hoops for a beautiful ear stack.

name: 14k White Gold Diamond Pav√© Huggies
description: Perfect for stacking or to wear alone, this pair of diamond earrings provides long-lasting shine. Wear yours stacked with other diamond huggie hoop earrings and studs.

name: Amara Ring Set
description: This fun ring set offers endless styling options. Wear these rings together or separately--whatever makes you happiest is sure to make you shine.

name: Laney Ring
description: The Laney Ring adds a modern touch to any look. This statement ring features a unique textured design and can be worn solo or stacked with other rings for a personalized look.

name: Bespoke Signet Ring
description: A timeless style, this signet ring is engravable for a personalized touch. Custom engrave this ring with your initials or favorite number.

name: Lou Heart Statement Ring
description: This alternating heart statement ring offers a cool way to add a little love to your look.

name: Lou Statement Ring
description: Take your stack to the next level with this beautiful, gold plated statement ring. Its simple yet eye-catching design is a perfect for day and night.

name: Rose Ring Set
description: This classic ring set offers endless styling options. Wear these rings together or separately--whatever makes you happiest is sure to make you shine.

name: Zoey Bracelet
description: A gorgeous gold-plated chain bracelet, with a classic link design that's sure to make a statement. Perfect for any occasion, it can be stacked with other bracelets for the ultimate stack.

name: Go To Bracelet Set
description: Two perfectly paired gold plated bracelets.

name: Amour Bracelet Red
description: Hearts are a symbol of style, grace and meaningful connection. Add a touch of love and color to your bracelet stack with this adjustable gold bracelet featuring dainty red enamel hearts.

name: Brooklyn Bracelet
description: Transform your stack with this eye-catching bracelet. Featuring a retro-inspired design, this textured bracelet is sure to turn heads.

name: Venice Mini Bracelet
description: We love this mini herringbone bracelet. Its smooth texture adds beautiful shine to any stack making it the perfect finishing touch to your look.

name: Parker Pearl Bracelet
description: A pearl bracelet is a timeless choice, and stacks well with both gold and silver bracelets.

name: Carter Gemstone Bracelet
description: Add a subtle pop of color to your stack with this mother of pearl gemstone bracelet.

name: Venice Watch Bracelet
description: Complete your stack with this lightweight, watch band-inspired bracelet. We love this worn solo or stacked with your go-to bracelets.

description: be¬∑ spoke styles feature a sliding adjustable bead to fit all wrist sizes. A meaningful gift for bridesmaids, brides, graduates, mothers, and just because.

description: This lightweight link bracelet brings a touch of natural beauty to any stack.

description: Designed for every day, this 14k solid gold ring features a beautiful twist texture and helium design.
